subject: Accidents and Safety
Automobile Safety Features and Defects
lead_paragraph: Sid Watkins was so moved by the death of his friend Ayrton Senna in 1994 that he launched a major safety campaign; thanks to his efforts, no driver has died at a Formula One event or test since.
snippet: Sid Watkins was so moved by the death of his friend Ayrton Senna in 1994 that he launched a major safety campaign; thanks to his efforts, no driver has died at a Formula One event or test since.
